overview: A short animated film about the 1943 detroit race riots and how rumors played a role in it.  RUMOR  Discussion film on prevention of rumors  Drawn by the celebrated cartoonist, Robert Osborn, this highly original,  animated film traces the development of an idle rumor into a city-wide  riot, and poses the question What Defense Against Rumors? Pro-  duced with the cooperation of the Anti-Defamation League of B'nai B'rith.  One of the Challenge films designed as discussion springboards.
title: Rumor
